message: Dear esteemed fellow player, I am in a dire situation. My family is starving and we desperately need resources. I am proposing a trade, hoping that kindness still exists in this world. I assure you, any help you provide will be a blessing for my family.

received_message: I am sorry to hear about your situation. I am more than willing to help. However, the trade you proposed would put me at a disadvantage. I am proposing a new trade that will benefit both of us.
message: I appreciate your willingness to help, but the proposed trade would still leave my family starving. I beg you to reconsider. I need more resources than what you are offering. I am ready to give more, but I need more in return. Please, help us.

received_message: I understand your predicament and I truly want to assist you. However, the proposed trade is not feasible for me. I am proposing a new trade that I believe will be beneficial for both of us.
message: I beg you to understand my situation. Your offer is still not enough to feed my family. I am in a dire situation and I need your help. Please, I implore you to reconsider and help me out here. I am willing to give more, but I need more in return.

received_message: I can see that you are in a difficult situation and I want to help. I'm proposing a new trade that I believe will be fair for both of us. Let's keep the spirit of fairness alive.
